channel.title: Unix on Edmonds Commerce Dev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Unix on Edmonds Commerce Dev Blog

item.title: Writing Robust Bash Shell Scripts
item.description:
Found this great article on writing bash scripts defensively. Glad to say most of the advice we are already following with our bash scripts however there are a couple of new things I intend to roll in on Monday.

Recommended reading for anyone scripting in Bash.

http://www.davidpashley.com/articles/writing-robust-shell-scripts.html

item.title: 16 Really Useful Shell Commands
item.description:
This is post is now quite old and the the information it contains may be out of date or innacurate.

If you find any errors or have any suggestions to update the information please let us know or create a pull request on GitHub

Check out this blog post by NuBlue, 16 Really Useful Shell Commands..

A good intro to some of the most commonly used shell commands with nice explanations, well done guys :)
